    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAlienInfo(javafx.scene.layout.VBox introGameInfo, Enemy alien)
      Generates an HBox containing an Enemy object and their game stats in a compact UI Element the user can easily read through
      javafx.scene.layout.VBox ceateModeSelector()
      Generates the Mode Picker that allows the user to choose between standard and double-cost mode.
      javafx.scene.layout.HBox createDefenderBar()
      Creates Defender Bar Defender Bar contains the Defender Cards that the player can select when dragging and dropping onto the field.
      void createInfoButton()
      Method to create the Info Button and its handler to generate a helpful menu the user can use to gain insight on rules, gameplay and game characters they will come across
      javafx.scene.layout.HBox createMapSelectionBar()
      Creates the Map Selection Bar User is given the option of selecting from three different themed maps with growing difficulty.
      javafx.scene.layout.VBox createStartMenuButtonBox()
      Generates Button Box held in the center of the Start Menu This component stores the various buttons that are provided within the Start Menu to allow the user to view information about the game, select a game mode, and begin the game.
      javafx.scene.layout.HBox createUtilityBar()
      Creates the Utility Bar The Utility Bar contains Buttons that are useful to the player during gameplay such as fast-forwarding and pausing the game.
      void displayPauseMenu(javafx.scene.control.Button pauseBtn)
      Displays the menu when the pause button is pressed.
      void initializeNewView()
      Method that initializes a new View object with fresh attributes to allow re-usability if user wishes to start a new game.
      void music()
      Generates a music player to play specific music depending on the current state of the game
      void performMove(MoveMessage message)
      Executes movement on the board This method is responsible for all movement on the board, including tower placement, tower removal and alien/ammo movement.
      void placeBullet(MoveMessage message)
      Places a bullet onto the View (to initiate Ammo animation)
      javafx.scene.layout.VBox setupDefenderCard(DefenderTower defender)
      Method to setup a DefenderTower Card that provides the user with a UI element they can interact with to select and place onto the game board.
      void setupGameScene()
      Sets up the game scene containing the actual game assets and functionality
      void setupGrid()
      Sets up the GridPane containing a grid of open Tile objects as well as the extreme home-base/enemy-entry points
      void setupProgressHBox()
      Sets up Progress Bar for Game Stage This progress bar element will maintain the status of the current stages, updating accordingly as the game progresses.
      void setupStartMenu()
      Generates the Start Menu This menu allows the user to view the theme of the game and provides them with different options of playing the game.
      javafx.scene.layout.VBox setupTopMenuBar()
      Sets up top navigation bar containing the defenders that can be placed onto the board.
      void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Method called upon launching the Viw.
      void triggerModal(java.lang.String titleImage, java.lang.String backgroundImage, java.lang.String message, javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer endgameMusic)
      Method that provides user with Game Over modal when detected User will be presented a Modal that will stop the progress of the game and allow the user to return to the MainMenu.
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Method to execute updates to the View according to the changes observed on the Model.

      • performMove

        public void performMove(MoveMessage message)
        Executes movement on the board This method is responsible for all movement on the board, including tower placement, tower removal and alien/ammo movement.

        endgameMusic -

      • music

        public void music()
        Generates a music player to play specific music depending on the current state of the game

      • setupStartMenu

        public void setupStartMenu()
        Generates the Start Menu This menu allows the user to view the theme of the game and provides them with different options of playing the game.

      • createStartMenuButtonBox

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createStartMenuButtonBox()
        Generates Button Box held in the center of the Start Menu This component stores the various buttons that are provided within the Start Menu to allow the user to view information about the game, select a game mode, and begin the game.
        Returns:
        generated VBox object with the associated Buttons

      • createInfoButton

        public void createInfoButton()
        Method to create the Info Button and its handler to generate a helpful menu the user can use to gain insight on rules, gameplay and game characters they will come across

        introGameInfo - VBox that the new HBox will be added to
        alien - Enemy object to be added

      • displayPauseMenu

        public void displayPauseMenu(javafx.scene.control.Button pauseBtn)
        Displays the menu when the pause button is pressed. This menu provides the user with the option to quit to the main menu, view helpful information about the game, or resume playing.
        Parameters:
        pauseBtn - Pause Button required to be fired when resumed

      • createDefenderBar

        public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createDefenderBar()
        Creates Defender Bar Defender Bar contains the Defender Cards that the player can select when dragging and dropping onto the field. Also contains a Currency Card updating the user on their current bank amount. Also includes a remove button that allows the player to remove a tower from the field.
        Returns:
        Generated HBox Object

      • setupDefenderCard

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox setupDefenderCard(DefenderTower defender)
        Method to setup a DefenderTower Card that provides the user with a UI element they can interact with to select and place onto the game board.
        Parameters:
        defender - DefenderTower object needing a generated card
        Returns:
        Generated VBox containing defender image and cost label
